title: Move the ImplicitPlugins definitions to a json file
description: ImplicitPlugins.java is all about constructing the datastructures programmatically. it's much better if they were represented in a proper json file

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 5a15fed9f5249cf658ddfbccae55733bb5855190 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Noble Paul
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=5a15fed ]

SOLR-8700 eliminate the java class for implicit plugins
